description:
Syncfusion Calendar for Xamarin.Android is a user interface component that displays the Gregorian calendar. This component allows the user to select a date, and also provides a gesture-friendly UI to perform operations like navigation, events, and more. 

Key features:
• Restrict navigation beyond the specified minimum and maximum dates.
• Blackout specific dates.
• Select single, multiple, and range dates. 
• Appearance customization.
• Display selected date’s appointments below the month view in agenda view.
• Localization of all static text and globalization. 

Note: This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Android project only.

Learn more: https://www.syncfusion.com/products/xamarin-android/calendar?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

Documentation: https://help.syncfusion.com/xamarin-android/sfcalendar/getting-started?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

Support:
Incident: https://www.syncfusion.com/support/directtrac/incidents/newincident?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing
Forum: https://www.syncfusion.com/forums/xamarin.android?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

title: Syncfusion Calendar for Xamarin.Android
